_header: Man upon mould whatsoever thou be
_description: On the need of money — nine quatrains (aaab) with refrain: ‘but þou haue þe peny redy to tak to’

BodEngPoete1.First Lines:
Man vpon mold what so euer þou beI warn utterly þou
                    getyst no degre…
BodEngPoete1.Last Lines:
…I warne þe com not þer but þou purse mey
                    suelebut þou haue þe peny redy to tak to
